name: On The Other Side (Dominic Turner)
description: This is the first 3D game I have attempted since starting my game arts and design course at university i have never done anything of the sort before in my life nor have I ever done any form of 3D modelling before. All of the assets were created by me and were an absolute joy to make so please enjoy the experience because although it is short and doesn't have much too it I am very proud of what i have learnt and been able to make in such a short amount of time.
